name: Br00talTr00per
description:
The end of the earth is at hand. The creatures of space have invaded the earth, attracted by a warming climate and technology abandoned by mankind. Most people have already managed to escape to a new planet. After the space creatures take over the last spacecraft, the remaining ones are in trouble.

The last hope of the remaining people, Sepi the Soldier, takes control and decides to take the evacuation ship back from the creatures. Will Sepi succeed in his mission?

This game is a demo

Hate it or love it? leave us feedback!

https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=lNlZWzIQvE-HBTZUTG4O2x0JcJhL...
